inclusion.criterion: First Nations or Caucasian subjects between the ages of 18 and 70 years.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A minimum of 12 months from the transplant procedure.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No acute rejection episode within the previous 3 months.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with absorption problems or unable to take oral medications.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Wilson disease, which may be relevant for the study.
